articles.description: Could there be a test to separate infected people into those likely to recover at home and those likely to require hospital or ICU care?
articles.content: COVID-19 continues to be a global challenge, with over 7.3 million cases and 416,000 deaths (at the time of writing). Some 120,000 new cases are being detected every day, stretching medical facilitie… [+6191 chars]

articles.description: Rosemary Barton asks the United States's top infectious disease expert about how his country has handled the pandemic and what's next. Welcome to The Nationa...
